header.name: boost/log/sources/basic_logger.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
08.03.2007
The header contains implementation of a base class for loggers. Convenience macros for defining custom loggers are also provided.

class.name: basic_composite_logger
class.purpose: A composite logger that inherits a number of features.

description.para: The composite logger is a helper class that simplifies feature composition into the final logger. The user's logger class is expected to derive from the composite logger class, instantiated with the character type, the user's logger class, the threading model and the list of the required features. The former three parameters are passed to the basic_logger class template. The feature list must be an MPL type sequence, where each element is a unary MPL metafunction class, that upon applying on its argument results in a logging feature class that derives from the argument. Every logger feature provided by the library can participate in the feature list.

typedef.name: swap_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the swap_unlocked method.

description.para: The method adds an attribute to the source-specific attribute set. The attribute will be implicitly added to every log record made with the current logger.

returns.para: A pair of values. If the second member is true, then the attribute is added and the first member points to the attribute. Otherwise the attribute was not added and the first member points to the attribute that prevents addition.

description.para: Iterator to the previously added attribute.
The method removes an attribute from the source-specific attribute set.

requires.para: The attribute was added with the add_attribute call for this instance of the logger.

postconditions.para: The attribute is no longer registered as a source-specific attribute for this logger. The iterator is invalidated after removal.

description.para: The method removes all attributes from the logger. All iterators and references to the removed attributes are invalidated.
The method retrieves a copy of a set with all attributes from the logger.

returns.para: The copy of the attribute set. Attributes are shallow-copied.

description.para: The set of attributes to install into the logger. Attributes are shallow-copied.

The method installs the whole attribute set into the logger. All iterators and references to elements of the previous set are invalidated. Iterators to the attrs set are not valid to be used with the logger (that is, the logger owns a copy of attrs after completion).
The method opens a new log record in the logging core.

returns.para: A valid record handle if the logging record is opened successfully, an invalid handle otherwise.

description.para: A set of additional named arguments. The parameter is ignored.
The method opens a new log record in the logging core.

returns.para: A valid record handle if the logging record is opened successfully, an invalid handle otherwise.

description.para: The log record with the formatted message
The method pushes the constructed message to the logging core
Assignment for the final class. Threadsafe, provides strong exception guarantee.

class-specialization.name: basic_composite_logger
class-specialization.purpose: An optimized composite logger version with no multithreading support.

class.name: basic_logger
class.purpose: Basic logger class.

description.para: The basic_logger class template serves as a base class for all loggers provided by the library. It can also be used as a base for user-defined loggers. The template parameters are:

CharT - logging character type
FinalT - final type of the logger that eventually derives from the basic_logger. There may be other classes in the hierarchy between the final class and basic_logger.
ThreadingModelT - threading model policy. Must provide methods of the Boost.Thread locking concept used in basic_logger class and all its derivatives in the hierarchy up to the FinalT class. The basic_logger class itself requires methods of the SharedLockable concept. The threading model policy must also be default and copy-constructible and support member function swap. There are currently two policies provided: single_thread_model and multi_thread_model.
The logger implements fundamental facilities of loggers, such as storing source-specific attribute set and formatting log record messages. The basic logger interacts with the logging core in order to apply filtering and pass records to sinks.

typedef.name: swap_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the swap_unlocked method.

typedef.name: add_attribute_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the add_attribute_unlocked method.

typedef.name: remove_attribute_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the remove_attribute_unlocked method.

typedef.name: remove_all_attributes_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the remove_all_attributes_unlocked method.

typedef.name: get_attributes_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the get_attributes method.

typedef.name: open_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the open_record_unlocked method.

typedef.name: set_attributes_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the set_attributes method.

typedef.name: push_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the push_record_unlocked method.

description.para: Constructor. Initializes internal data structures of the basic logger class, acquires reference to the logging core.
Copy constructor. Copies all attributes from the source logger.

note.para: Not thread-safe. The source logger must be locked in the final class before copying.

description.para: Move constructor. Moves all attributes from the source logger.

note.para: Not thread-safe. The source logger must be locked in the final class before copying.

description.para: Constructor with named arguments. The constructor ignores all arguments. The result of construction is equivalent to default construction.
An accessor to the logging system pointer
An accessor to the logger attributes
An accessor to the logger attributes
An accessor to the threading model base
An accessor to the threading model base
An accessor to the final logger
An accessor to the final logger

copy-assignment.purpose: Assignment is closed (should be implemented through copy and swap in the final class)

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_TYPE

description.para: The name of the logger class to declare
The character type of the logger. Either char or wchar_t expected.
A Boost.Preprocessor sequence of type identifiers of the base classes templates

macro.purpose: The macro declares a logger class that inherits a number of base classes.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER

description.para: The name of the logger class to declare
A Boost.Preprocessor sequence of type identifiers of the base classes templates

macro.purpose: The macro declares a narrow-char logger class that inherits a number of base classes.

description.para: Equivalent to BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_TYPE(type_name, char, base_seq, single_thread_model)

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_MT

description.para: The name of the logger class to declare
A Boost.Preprocessor sequence of type identifiers of the base classes templates

macro.purpose: The macro declares a narrow-char thread-safe logger class that inherits a number of base classes.

description.para: Equivalent to BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_TYPE(type_name, char, base_seq, multi_thread_model< shared_mutex >)

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_WLOGGER

description.para: The name of the logger class to declare
A Boost.Preprocessor sequence of type identifiers of the base classes templates

macro.purpose: The macro declares a wide-char logger class that inherits a number of base classes.

description.para: Equivalent to BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_TYPE(type_name, wchar_t, base_seq, single_thread_model)

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_WLOGGER_MT

description.para: The name of the logger class to declare
A Boost.Preprocessor sequence of type identifiers of the base classes templates

macro.purpose: The macro declares a wide-char thread-safe logger class that inherits a number of base classes.

description.para: Equivalent to BOOST_LOG_DECLARE_LOGGER_TYPE(type_name, wchar_t, base_seq, multi_thread_model< shared_mutex >)

header.name: boost/log/sources/channel_feature.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
28.02.2008
The header contains implementation of a channel support feature.

class.name: basic_channel_logger
class.purpose: Channel feature implementation.

typedef.name: open_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the open_record_unlocked method.

typedef.name: swap_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the swap_unlocked method.

description.para: The observer of the channel name

returns.para: The channel name that was set by the logger

description.para: The channel name to be set for the logger
The setter of the channel name
Default constructor. The constructed logger has the default-constructed channel name.

A set of named arguments. The following arguments are supported:
channel - a string that represents the channel name
Constructor with arguments. Allows to register a channel name attribute on construction.

method.name: open_record_with_channel_unlocked
method.purpose: The open_record implementation for the case when the channel is specified in log statement.

method.name: open_record_with_channel_unlocked
method.purpose: The open_record implementation for the case when the channel is not specified in log statement.

description.para: The logger with this feature automatically registers an attribute with the specified on construction value, which is a channel name. The channel name can be modified through the logger life time, either by calling the channel method or by specifying the name in the logging statement.
The type of the channel name can be customized by providing it as a template parameter to the feature template. By default, a string will be used.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_STREAM_CHANNEL
macro.purpose: The macro allows to put a record with a specific channel name into log.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_CHANNEL
macro.purpose: An equivalent to BOOST_LOG_STREAM_CHANNEL(logger, chan)

header.name: boost/log/sources/channel_logger.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
28.02.2008
The header contains implementation of a logger with channel support.

class.name: channel_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, channel_logger< ChannelT >, single_thread_model, features< channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See channel class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified channel name

class.name: channel_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, channel_logger_mt< ChannelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See channel class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified channel name

class.name: wchannel_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wchannel_logger< ChannelT >, single_thread_model, features< channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See channel class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified channel name

class.name: wchannel_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wchannel_logger< ChannelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See channel class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified channel name

header.name: boost/log/sources/exception_handler_feature.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
17.07.2009
The header contains implementation of an exception handler support feature.

class.name: basic_exception_handler_logger
class.purpose: Exception handler feature implementation.

typedef.name: open_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the open_record_unlocked method.

typedef.name: push_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the push_record_unlocked method.

typedef.name: swap_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the swap_unlocked method.

description.para: The method sets exception handler function. The function will be called with no arguments in case if an exception occurs during either open_record or push_record method execution. Since exception handler is called from a catch statement, the exception can be rethrown in order to determine its type.
By default no handler is installed, thus any exception is propagated as usual.

note.para: The exception handler can be invoked in several threads concurrently.
Thread interruptions are not affected by exception handlers.

description.para: Default constructor. The constructed logger does not have an exception handler.
Constructor with arguments. Passes arguments to other features.

The logger with this feature will provide an additional method to install an exception handler functional object. This functional object will be called if during either opening or pushing a record an exception is thrown from the logging core.

header.name: boost/log/sources/features.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
17.07.2009
The header contains definition of a features list class template.

struct.name: features
struct.purpose: A type sequence of logger features.

description.para: This class template can be used to specify logger features in a basic_composite_logger instantiation.

header.name: boost/log/sources/global_logger_storage.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
21.04.2008
The header contains implementation of facilities to declare global loggers.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_GLOBAL_LOGGER
macro.purpose: The macro forward-declares a global logger with a custom initialization.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_GLOBAL_LOGGER_INIT
macro.purpose: The macro defines a global logger initialization routine.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_GLOBAL_LOGGER_DEFAULT
macro.purpose: The macro defines a global logger initializer that will default-construct the logger.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_GLOBAL_LOGGER_CTOR_ARGS
macro.purpose: The macro defines a global logger initializer that will construct the logger with the specified constructor arguments.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_INLINE_GLOBAL_LOGGER_INIT
macro.purpose: The macro declares a global logger with a custom initialization.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_INLINE_GLOBAL_LOGGER_DEFAULT
macro.purpose: The macro declares a global logger that will be default-constructed.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_INLINE_GLOBAL_LOGGER_CTOR_ARGS
macro.purpose: The macro declares a global logger that will be constructed with the specified arguments.

header.name: boost/log/sources/logger.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
08.03.2007
The header contains implementation of a simplistic logger with no features.

class.name: logger
class.purpose: Narrow-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_logger.

description.para: See basic_logger class template for a more detailed description.

class.name: logger_mt
class.purpose: Narrow-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_logger.

description.para: See basic_logger class template for a more detailed description.

class.name: wlogger
class.purpose: Wide-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_logger.

description.para: See basic_logger class template for a more detailed description.

class.name: wlogger_mt
class.purpose: Wide-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_logger.

description.para: See basic_logger class template for a more detailed description.

header.name: boost/log/sources/record_ostream.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
09.03.2009
This header contains a wrapper class around a logging record that allows to compose the record message with a streaming expression.

class.name: basic_record_ostream
class.purpose: Logging record adapter with a streaming capability.

description.para: This class allows to compose the logging record message by streaming operations. It aggregates the log record and provides the standard output stream interface.

typedef.name: string_type
typedef.purpose: String type to be used as a message text holder.

description.para: Conversion to an unspecified boolean type

returns.para: true, if stream is valid and ready for formatting, false, if the stream is not valid. The latter also applies to the case when the stream is not attached to a log record.

description.para: Inverted conversion to an unspecified boolean type

returns.para: false, if stream is valid and ready for formatting, true, if the stream is not valid. The latter also applies to the case when the stream is not attached to a log record.

description.para: Flushes internal buffers to complete all pending formatting operations and returns the aggregated log record
Flushes internal buffers to complete all pending formatting operations and returns the aggregated log record
New log record to attach to
If the stream is attached to a log record, flushes internal buffers to complete all pending formatting operations. Then reattaches the stream to another log record.

method.name: detach_from_record
method.purpose: The function resets the stream into a detached (default initialized) state.

description.para: Default constructor. Creates an empty record that is equivalent to the invalid record handle. The stream capability is not available after construction.
The record handle being attached to
Constructor from a record object. Attaches to the provided record.
Destructor. Destroys the record, releases any sinks and attribute values that were involved in processing this record.

method.name: init_stream
method.purpose: The function initializes the stream and the stream buffer.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_STREAM
macro.purpose: The macro writes a record to the log.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_STREAM_WITH_PARAMS
macro.purpose: The macro writes a record to the log and allows to pass additional named arguments to the logger.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG
macro.purpose: An equivalent to BOOST_LOG_STREAM(logger)

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_WITH_PARAMS
macro.purpose: An equivalent to BOOST_LOG_STREAM_WITH_PARAMS(logger, params_seq)

header.name: boost/log/sources/severity_channel_logger.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
28.02.2008
The header contains implementation of a logger with severity level and channel support.

class.name: severity_channel_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, severity_channel_logger< LevelT, ChannelT >, single_thread_model, features< severity< LevelT >, channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger and basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See severity and channel class templates for a more detailed description

class.name: severity_channel_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, severity_channel_logger_mt< LevelT, ChannelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< severity< LevelT >, channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger and basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See severity and channel class templates for a more detailed description

class.name: wseverity_channel_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wseverity_channel_logger< LevelT, ChannelT >, single_thread_model, features< severity< LevelT >, channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger and basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See severity and channel class templates for a more detailed description

class.name: wseverity_channel_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wseverity_channel_logger_mt< LevelT, ChannelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< severity< LevelT >, channel< ChannelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger and basic_channel_logger.

description.para: See severity and channel class templates for a more detailed description

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_STREAM_CHANNEL_SEV
macro.purpose: The macro allows to put a record with a specific channel name into log.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_CHANNEL_SEV
macro.purpose: An equivalent to BOOST_LOG_STREAM_CHANNEL_SEV(logger, chan, lvl)

header.name: boost/log/sources/severity_feature.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
08.03.2007
The header contains implementation of a severity level support feature.

class.name: basic_severity_logger
class.purpose: Severity level feature implementation.

typedef.name: open_record_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the open_record_unlocked method.

typedef.name: swap_lock
typedef.purpose: Lock requirement for the swap_unlocked method.

description.para: Default constructor. The constructed logger will have a severity attribute registered. The default level for log records will be 0.

A set of named arguments. The following arguments are supported:
severity - default severity value
Constructor with named arguments. Allows to setup the default level for log records.

The logger with this feature registers a special attribute with an integral value type on construction. This attribute will provide severity level for each log record being made through the logger. The severity level can be omitted on logging record construction, in which case the default level will be used. The default level can also be customized by passing it to the logger constructor.
The type of the severity level attribute can be specified as a template parameter for the feature template. By default, int will be used.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_STREAM_SEV
macro.purpose: The macro allows to put a record with a specific severity level into log.

macro.name: BOOST_LOG_SEV
macro.purpose: An equivalent to BOOST_LOG_STREAM_SEV(logger, lvl)

header.name: boost/log/sources/severity_logger.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
08.03.2007
The header contains implementation of a logger with severity level support.

class.name: severity_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, severity_logger< LevelT >, single_thread_model, features< severity< LevelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger.

description.para: See severity class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified default severity level

class.name: severity_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< char, severity_logger_mt< LevelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< severity< LevelT > > >
class.purpose: Narrow-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger.

description.para: See severity class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified default severity level

class.name: wseverity_logger
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wseverity_logger< LevelT >, single_thread_model, features< severity< LevelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger.

description.para: See severity class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified default severity level

class.name: wseverity_logger_mt
class.inherit: basic_composite_logger< wchar_t, wseverity_logger_mt< LevelT >, multi_thread_model< implementation_defined >, features< severity< LevelT > > >
class.purpose: Wide-char thread-safe logger. Functionally equivalent to basic_severity_logger.

description.para: See severity class template for a more detailed description
The constructor creates the logger with the specified default severity level

header.name: boost/log/sources/threading_models.hpp
header.para:
Andrey Semashev
04.10.2008
The header contains definition of threading models that can be used in loggers. The header also provides a number of tags that can be used to express lock requirements on a function callee.

struct.name: multi_thread_model
struct.purpose: Multi-thread locking model with maximum locking capabilities.
